title: ISic003474. I.Sicily inscription 003474
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΤΟΙΠΥΤΙΚΑ
2ΠΥΡΙΝΟ̄Ι
3ΕΠΟΙΕ̄ΣΕ
4ΣϘΥΛΟΣ

Apparatus criticus

Text after Manganaro 2001

English translation

To the (son) of Pytikas Pyrinos, Skylos made it.

Italian translation

Al (figlio) di Pytikas Pyrinos, fece Skylos.

commentary
